version_description:
New: soccer items + in game mentors!

- 5 new avatar items for soccer fans!
- In game chat which connects you to mentors for getting quick answer about the game
- Small profile stats improvements
- iPad + iPhone X support
- New language: Hindi!

Happy hunting!

Happy hunting!

New: ranked games and lots of bug fixes!

- Ranked games: starting Monday you can compete with others in a competitive settings. The first season will last one week!
- Option to bulk purchase talismans
- Better country hair for soccer fans!
- Fix headhunter sometimes not winning

Happy hunting!

New: roses, role updates and loyalty tokens!

- Roses: receive roses from your friends to unlock special items!
- Sect leader cannot convert werewolves during the night
- Arsonist can select two players to douse per night
- Loyalty tokens: receive tokens for each loot box or 100 gold you purchase and unlock limited items!

New: music, friend referrals and 3 new roles!

- Music: for the first time ever, Werewolf Online has sound effects and music! Thanks to Peter Cleaver for creating the music!
- Friend referrals: invite your friends to install Werewolf and unlock special items!
- New roles: cupid, beast hunter and mayor!

Happy hunting!

New: new item slots!

- New item slots: background and foreground items for your avatar. Items will be unlocked soon!
- Option to play again with friends in game over!
- In friend-games your friends can now invite other friends
- Medium can view the night chat during the day
- Referred friends receive an exclusive item when first opening the app!
- Gunner in sect can no longer shoot sect leader

New: custom games!

- Create your own (private) games and select which roles appear!
- More front and back avatar accessories!
- New YouTube items: create a video with 500 or 5000 views and receive special gifts!

Got any problems or suggestions? Talk to us on Discord at https://discord.gg/uUkhn9g. We love feedback!

New: game updates and bug fixes!

- Lovers: see the role of your lover when falling in love
- Suicides: sect leader, lovers and and junior werewolf will not kill others when committing suicide
- Sound: playing different music while in game now works!
- Custom games: talisman are disabled in custom games
- Sect leader: fix sometimes tie game over when converting last member

Got any problems or suggestions? Talk to us on Discord at https://discord.gg/uUkhn9g. We love feedback!

New: 5 new roles + ranked games in Thai / Vietnamese!

- Witch: potions to kill + protect others
- Avenger: select a player to kill when you are killed
- Detective: investigate player teams
- Cursed: convert into a werewolf when killed by werewolves
- President: evil team kill president to win
- Grid hopping: change your position in the lobby!

Got any problems or suggestions? Talk to us on Discord at https://discord.gg/uUkhn9g. We love feedback!

New: rejoin game button + new start game voting system!

- Rejoin button: if you loose connection to the game for any reason, you can now rejoin games while they are running!
- Player level + stats are hidden in ranked games

What's new: spectator mode! Join games that your friends are playing and watch the match!

How do you find the spectator mode?

Simply open the friends menu on the right side of the main screen. If you see a popcorn icon, that means you can watch your friend play! The spectator mode is enabled for sandbox games only but will soon be available in other modes as well!

Got any problems or suggestions? Talk to us on Discord at https://discord.gg/wwo. We love feedback!

Welcome to update Wolvesville! What's new:

- Rebrand to Wolvesville, goodbye Werewolf Online
- 2 brand new roles + 1 fun role for Easter
- Dynamic loading screens
- Configurable backgrounds
- A dark mode offer
- 20 outfit remakes
- Daily challenges for extra xp
- New music
- Battle pass bundle offer
- Option to send multiple roses at once
- Gems in daily rewards
- Ranked updates: hide roles in lobby, lower join requirements and updated rewards
- New social media items and tiers
- More outfits for daily rewards, loyalty tokens and quests!

For more details please visit our development blog at https://blog.wolvesville.com/ :)
